<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ae42219072d798876e6b08e6b78614ff6">H</a>-&gt;HeaderSize = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/pdb/tpistreamheader">TpiStreamHeader</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ae42219072d798876e6b08e6b78614ff6">H</a>-&gt;TypeRecordBytes = TypeRecordBytes;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ae42219072d798876e6b08e6b78614ff6">H</a>-&gt;HashStreamIndex = HashStreamIndex;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ae42219072d798876e6b08e6b78614ff6">H</a>-&gt;HashAuxStreamIndex = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a0a7a9a9849fa2f1e5dec7a99ba9530da">kInvalidStreamIndex</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ae42219072d798876e6b08e6b78614ff6">H</a>-&gt;HashKeySize = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/#a206b37274fa3e908017da357d12724d1">ulittle32&#95;t</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ae42219072d798876e6b08e6b78614ff6">H</a>-&gt;NumHashBuckets = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a33e0381dca94b7c0bf6f0e25b356228b">MaxTpiHashBuckets</a> - 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Recall that hash values go into a completely different stream identified by</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the &#96;HashStreamIndex&#96; field of the &#96;TpiStreamHeader&#96;.  Therefore, the data</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// begins at offset 0 of this independent stream.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ae42219072d798876e6b08e6b78614ff6">H</a>-&gt;HashValueBuffer.Off = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ae42219072d798876e6b08e6b78614ff6">H</a>-&gt;HashValueBuffer.Length = calculateHashBufferSize();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We never write any adjustments into our PDBs, so this is usually some</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// offset with zero length.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ae42219072d798876e6b08e6b78614ff6">H</a>-&gt;HashAdjBuffer.Off = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ae42219072d798876e6b08e6b78614ff6">H</a>-&gt;HashValueBuffer.Off + <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ae42219072d798876e6b08e6b78614ff6">H</a>-&gt;HashValueBuffer.Length;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ae42219072d798876e6b08e6b78614ff6">H</a>-&gt;HashAdjBuffer.Length = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ae42219072d798876e6b08e6b78614ff6">H</a>-&gt;IndexOffsetBuffer.Off = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ae42219072d798876e6b08e6b78614ff6">H</a>-&gt;HashAdjBuffer.Off + <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ae42219072d798876e6b08e6b78614ff6">H</a>-&gt;HashAdjBuffer.Length;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ae42219072d798876e6b08e6b78614ff6">H</a>-&gt;IndexOffsetBuffer.Length = calculateIndexOffsetSize();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="normal">  Header = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ae42219072d798876e6b08e6b78614ff6">H</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#a4dfd0813c3d0e0a30439b5a3e9196b59">Error::success</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal">  HashStreamIndex = &#42;ExpectedIndex;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; TypeHashes.size(); ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal">      HashBuffer&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; = TypeHashes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; % (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a33e0381dca94b7c0bf6f0e25b356228b">MaxTpiHashBuckets</a> - 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (HashStreamIndex != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a0a7a9a9849fa2f1e5dec7a99ba9530da">kInvalidStreamIndex</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> HVS = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/msf/writablemappedblockstream/#a08d954d5d32ab48f6e656250700f8fc2">WritableMappedBlockStream::createIndexedStream</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
